text: Singapore’s favorite XXL crispy chicken from Taiwan. A branch located just at level 1 of Parkway Parade mall. Just one friendly staff managing the food and counter. But no compromise to quality or service. Easy to order take away and go.

good attitude and service from the only worker manning the cashier and cooking, but he is clearly overwhelmed. by the time i got my chicken it was lukewarm and soggy. dont recommend to patronise unless they got >1 staff working

Visited a few times and manpower is always the issue. The female staff tries her best to dish out the food correctly and promptly but she's clearly overwhelmed. Food tastes great, though there was an ant in my carrier.
The staff here looked jaded and restless at 1130am. He kept checking his phone when I wanted to order my food. He is like brushing me off after I placed my 1st item out of 3 items. Where is the 台湾之心？
Highly recommend the Taiwan fried chicken! Tenement to use ShopBack to get $0.60 discount!
